title: Liam Hemsworth and Maddison Brown enjoy passionate PDA on night out
text:
Liam and Maddison enjoy passionate PDA (Picture: ImageDirect)

Liam Hemsworth and Maddison Brown went very public with their blossoming romance on Thursday, with a full-on public display of affection in New York City.

The happy couple were pictured enjoying a very handsy moment after an evening of drinks at The Flower Shop bar with pals, before Maddison was seen bending over backwards as Liam nuzzled into her neck.

Clutching his Australian girlfriend on the hips, Liam then passionately kissed Maddison who wrapped her arms around his neck.

The two were seen with friends, and later Liam appeared to take things a step further when he picked up a traffic cone and tried to carry it on one shoulder.

Where are we, walking home from the student union, Liam?

Liam Hemsworth and Maddison Brown went very public (Picture: ImageDirect)

Liam was snapped earlier on Thursday holding hands with Dynasty actress Maddison, two months after he separated from wife of eight months, Miley.

After hiding out in Byron Bay for weeks, the 29-year-old was papped in New York City with the 22-year-old actress, best known for playing Kirby Anders on the Dynasty reboot, and also had a role in Strangerland opposite Nicole Kidman.

Clutching his Australian girlfriend on the hips, Liam passionately kissed Maddison (Picture: ImageDirect)

It’s no surprise that Hemsworth has chosen to get back on the dating scene, considering his ex is onto her second post-marriage relationship.

Miley, 26, was pictured kissing Kaitlynn Carter as news of her split from Liam broke, and the girls went on to date for a month before parting ways.

It’s no surprise that Hemsworth has chosen to get back on the dating scene (Picture: ImageDirect)

In a case of being careful what you wish for though, old video emerged of Maddison revealing that she has a big ol’ crush on his brothers as well – and that she would be down to ‘f**k the Hemsworth brothers’ at the same time.

In June, Maddison appeared on the Zach Sang Show and during a game of ‘f**k, kill, marry’ she outright insisted that she’d ‘f**k the Hemsworth brothers but at the same time, the both of them’.

‘I am going to kill Hugh Jackman, I am going marry Margot Robbie as I would like to f**k her for life, and then I will f**k the Hemsworth brothers but at the same time the both of them,’ she told Zach.
